subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Tommy Robredo rallied to beat Andy Murray, 0-6, 6-2, 6-3, in the final of the Moselle Open in Metz, France. Murray, seeded third, dominated the first set of the indoor tournament before Robredo took control.
snippet: Top-seeded Tommy Robredo rallied to beat Andy Murray, 0-6, 6-2, 6-3, in the final of the Moselle Open in Metz, France. Murray, seeded third, dominated the first set of the indoor tournament before Robredo took control.
